item.description:
Join RonPaulHQ to watch Ron Paul clean up at the first GOP presidential debate.

Remember the last time a candidate--from either party--ran on faithfulness the Constitution? Neither do we! So come watch Dr. Paul confuse his competition with phrases like "Founding Fathers," "powers not granted," and "individual liberty."


Directions:

From the west - Take Rt. 16 east/south past and through the traffic circle, continue south on Rt.1 by-pass. About a mile south of the traffic circle, you will see the Bowl-O-Rama sign to the left. Continue a few hundred feet to the traffic light. Turn left at the light into a small shopping center (the will be a mexican restaurant called Margarita's right there). Go left in the parking lot toward the Bowl-O-Rama. The entrance to Scoreboard is actually inside the doors to Bowl-O-Rama.

From I-95 - Take the exits for 16/1/traffic circle. Go south on Rt.1 by-pass. Continue as above.

From the south on Rt.1 - Take route 1 north. The Bowl-O-Rama/Scoreboard is right at the split of Rt.1 and Rt.1 by-pass. Stay to the right and take Rt.1 towards downtown Portsmouth but the Bowl-O- Rama is right there at the split.
item.name: Debate Watching Party! (Portsmouth)
